lead_paragraph: DUBOFSKY--Robert, Our family is heartbroken by the sudden loss of Bob, our dear friend for over 60 years. Our families' love and friendship has spanned four generations. Our lives will never be the same without him. Our deepest, heartfelt condolences to Betsy, Ned, Lindsay, Nancy, Stephen, Casey, Charlie, Matthew and Michael. Lorraine Sosnow-Aaron, Horowitz and Beer Families
